amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the construction of an ethanol blender pump or an ethanol storage facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the construction of an ethanol blender pump or an ethanol storage facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A057) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 128 (Roll no. 454).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A057) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 128 (Roll no. 454).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Flake.
